body.p: For each type of risk arising from contracts within the scope of IFRS 17, an entity shall disclose:

li.p: summary quantitative information about its exposure to that risk at the end of the reporting period. This disclosure shall be based on the information provided internally to the entity’s key management personnel.
the disclosures required by paragraphs 127–132, to the extent not provided applying (a) of this paragraph.
